TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer spread out of the kidney to nearby soft tissue or to blood vessels of the kidney and was completely removed by surgery. No cancer cells were found at the edges of the area where the cancer was removed.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II Wilms tumor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "tumor de Wilms en estadio II"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: tumor de Wilms en estadio II

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El cáncer se diseminó fuera del riñón hacia el tejido blando cercano o hacia los vasos sanguíneos del riñón, y se logró extirpar completamente por medio de cirugía. No se encontraron células cancerosas en los bordes del área de donde se extirpó el cáncer.
